fields_of_interest: Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, External Relations
eu_initiatives: Main work is to ensure that there is no diminution of rights and equality standards in Northern Ireland as a result of the Brexit process, including by protecting the Belfast/Good Friday Agreement.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The Consortium is a broad alliance of civil society organisations from across all communities, sectors and areas of Northern Ireland who work together to help develop a human rights based society.
relevant_communication: All of our publications are available on our website, most recent ones have been about our concerns with the EU Withdrawal Bill. We hosted a conference in Northern Ireland in June to bring sectors together to discuss rights and Brexit, we deliver local workshops on the same theme and co-ordinate a 'Human Rights and Brexit Working Group' with other Civil Society Organisations in Northern Ireland.
